text: @kumailn @superssankaku My dad will be 71 in may and has asthma and is already predisposed to getting pneumonia when he gets a cold. This could literally kill him and I get so angry when I see people making light of it or saying it isn’t going to happen. 2 cases were just diagnosed in my state today.
